languages.text: Корабль не так сильно поврежден, можно его будет восстановить

traits.locale_text: Корабль не так сильно поврежден, можно его будет восстановить

languages.text: Судя по планам палубы, за лифтами скрыто небольшое помещение, не попавшее на схему арбитров.
Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.
languages.original_text: Судя по планам палубы, за лифтами скрыто небольшое помещение, не попавшее на схему арбитров.

traits.locale_text: Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.
You're looking at the ship's status data: despite coming under fire, the Heartless has not taken critical damage, and can be repaired if you so choose.
Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.

languages.text: Den Deckplänen nach befindet sich versteckt hinter den Aufzügen ein kleiner Raum, der nicht auf der Darstellung des Arbitrators verzeichnet ist.
languages.original_text: Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.

traits.locale_text: Den Deckplänen nach befindet sich versteckt hinter den Aufzügen ein kleiner Raum, der nicht auf der Darstellung des Arbitrators verzeichnet ist.

languages.text: À en croire les plans du pont, une petite pièce est dissimulée derrière les ascenseurs et n'apparaît pas sur le schéma des arbitrators.
languages.original_text: Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.

traits.locale_text: À en croire les plans du pont, une petite pièce est dissimulée derrière les ascenseurs et n'apparaît pas sur le schéma des arbitrators.

languages.text: Según los planos de la cubierta, hay un cuarto oculto tras los ascensores que no figura en el diagrama de los Arbitrators.
languages.original_text: Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.

traits.locale_text: Según los planos de la cubierta, hay un cuarto oculto tras los ascensores que no figura en el diagrama de los Arbitrators.

languages.text: 根据甲板平面图来看，电梯后面隐藏着一个小小的房间。法务官手中的地图没有标出这个房间。
languages.original_text: Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.

traits.locale_text: 根据甲板平面图来看，电梯后面隐藏着一个小小的房间。法务官手中的地图没有标出这个房间。

languages.text: デッキプランを見る限り、エレベーターの背後に小さな部屋が隠されている。だがアービトレイターの図面には載っていないようだ。
languages.original_text: Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.

traits.locale_text: デッキプランを見る限り、エレベーターの背後に小さな部屋が隠されている。だがアービトレイターの図面には載っていないようだ。

languages.text: Güverte planlarına bakılırsa asansörlerin arkasında gizli ve Yargıcıların şemasında yer almayan küçük bir oda var.
languages.original_text: Judging from the deck plans, there is a small room hidden behind the elevators that did not make it onto the Arbitrators' diagram.

traits.locale_text: Güverte planlarına bakılırsa asansörlerin arkasında gizli ve Yargıcıların şemasında yer almayan küçük bir oda var.
